title: COOFANDY Mens Cuban Guayabera Shirt Casual Button Down Shirts Long Sleeve Summer Beach Shirts
description: Premium Fabric --- Men's cuban beach shirt is made of premium rayon fabric, which is breathable, soft, skin-friendly and provides ultra comfort all day long.

Cuban Guayabera Design --- Mens guayabera shirts features long sleeve, spread collar, button closure, cutout embroidery, relaxed fit. Distinct cuban design makes this shirt more fashionable and classic.

Collocation --- Men's button down long sleeve shirt makes a perfect versatile item and can easily be worn with to match with shorts, jeans, trousers, a jacket or a suit. Adding to your current collection that creat sophisticated look.
Occasions --- Long sleeve button down shirt suitable for casual daily wear, beach, tropical aloha theme, camp, school, office, beach, wedding, yoga, work or other leisure activities.
Garment Care --- US Size, Please read our size chart carefully before ordering. Hand or machine wash on gentle, hang or tumble dry low.
